metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4763 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in Networks in Google Chrome prior to 116.0.5845.179 alloweda remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
